title: Wedding Invitation
content:
Hello

It's the serif Adobe's Trajan?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329013924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/outside_6600.png)
  
I know it's a small picture, but can you help with the sans typeface used inside?  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329013924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/inside_3555.png)

Thank you very much
author: Alex Tamas

comments.content:
At this size and level of pixelation, it's a tall order. To me, the text _feels_ like Rotis Sans or SemiSans, but many of the (visible) details don't match up, so no go.

Are you sure there are no other larger specimens of this invite you can share here?

Do you know how to contact the designer to ask them?

Good luck...
I found another pic with a slightly better resolution: funny thing, on the inside, that vertical text, says "Linotype Textra; TRAJAN" :) So, sorry for the trouble and thanks for the replies.
